title: Ultimate Flash Killer
name: ultimate-flash-killer
description: Disable Flash and hiding its MIME. It enables server-side Flash validation logic (not client-side that existing plugins use). Add-on allowes a user-defined domain whitelist.
author: Flash Hater

preferences.name: whitelist
preferences.title: Whitelist of Flash-accepted domains
preferences.description: Whitelist of domains where Flash is REALLY necessary. Feel free to add comma-separated values manually or automatically by Extension, but be aware: 'www' is domain too.
